headline: Solar Foods Opens First Commercial Solein Production Facility
summary: Solar Foods inaugurates its first large-scale production facility for Solein, a protein powder made from air and electricity.

headline: Perfect Day Launches Animal-Free Ice Cream Nationwide
summary: Perfect Day expands the availability of its animal-free ice cream, made with precision-fermented whey protein, across the United States.

headline: Formo Secures $50M to Scale Precision Fermentation Cheese
summary: Formo raises $50M to scale its animal-free cheese production using precision fermentation technology. Aiming for commercial launch.

headline: MycoWorks Expands Production Capacity of Reishi Fine Mycelium Leather
summary: MycoWorks increases its production capacity of Reishi, its mycelium-based leather alternative, to meet growing demand.

headline: Modern Meadow Partners with Textile Company for Bio-Based Leather Alternative
summary: Modern Meadow collaborates to develop and distribute its bio-based leather alternative material for the textile industry.

headline: The Every Co. Announces New Animal-Free Egg Protein Partnership
summary: The Every Co. partners with a major food manufacturer to incorporate its animal-free egg white protein into new products.

headline: Air Protein Announces New Pilot Facility for Air-Based Meat
summary: Air Protein reveals plans for a pilot facility to produce its air-based meat alternative using carbon transformation technology.
